other_title: Di Gi Charat Rainy Season Special
デ・ジ・キャラット 梅雨スペシャル (Japanese)
plot: There is never a dull moment with this group and the adventure continues with an even more curious Dejiko. Whether it be falling down a black hole or dreaming of becoming the next great idol, these kids sure know how to cause havoc everywhere they go.
opening_theme: "Megami ni Naritai (女神になりたい; I Want to Become a Goddess) ~for a yours~" by Masami Okui
ending_theme: "see you see you" by Asami Sanada, Miyuki Sawashiro, and Kyoko Hikami
